    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractCapProfile

        public AbstractCapProfile()

      • AbstractCapProfile

        public AbstractCapProfile(boolean strictXsdValidation)
        Parameters:
        strictXsdValidation - if true, perform by-the-spec xsd schema validation, which does not check a number of properties specified elsewhere in the spec. If false (the default), attempt to do extra validation to conform to the text of the spec.

      • checkZeroTimezone

        protected void checkZeroTimezone(Reasons.Builder reasons,
                     String dateStr,
                     String xpath,
                     Reason.Type type)
        Checks if the timezone on the given dateStr is zero. If so, adds a new reason with the given xpath and type to the collection of reasons.
        Parameters:
        reasons - collection to add to if timezone is zero
        dateStr - date string to check
        xpath - xpath of the element
        type - type of the error to add if timezone is zero
